EmailTemplate.name: PRO Order Request - Missing key information (editable)
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Production Return Order Request {!Case.CaseNumber}, {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Case.Contact_Name__c},
Thanks for contacting Honeywell Aerospace Customer Support. We've received your production return order request (Part No. {!Case.Product_Part__c}, Serial No. {!Case.Product_Serial_Number__c}) for PO No. {!Case.Customer_PO_RO_WONumber__c}, and are anxious to get right to work on it.
But before we can start, we need your help. We need just a bit more information that was missing from your request.
>> <Insert missing or incorrect information - i.e., purchase order, serial number, part number, etc.>
Sending us the missing information is easy. Just reply to this email and include the needed details listed above. Here's your unique tracking number: {!Case.CaseNumber}. You can use this number to track our progress.
Questions? _______________________________________________________
We'll connect all of your request details through the subject line of this email. So, when you reply, please leave the subject line unchanged to make sure your response is routed immediately to this case.
Thanks again! We appreciate your business.
Honeywell Aerospace Customer & Product Support Web: http://www.myaerospace.com
1-800-601-3099 or internationally at 1-602-365-3099
